tool_description: A FREE and simple OFAC scan that returns TRUE (if the target was found) or FALSE (if the target was not found).  Use "Complete OFAC Scan" by Intelitruth for detailed records response.
name: Free OFAC Scan
title: Free OFAC Scan

api_list.name: free_ofac.api
api_list.description: This API returns a simple TRUE (target found) or FALSE (target not found) value n response to an OFAC scan request.

optional_parameters.name: street_address
optional_parameters.description: Street Address of individual or business entity target
